title: It'll be alright on the night. 3
creator_credit: Paul Smith and London Weekend Television
brief_description: Written and presented by English comedian, Denis Norden, this program features as part of a television series on British television. Shows a collection of bloopers and stuff-ups in the film and television industry in Great Britain and America from feature films to commercials to soap-operas to current affairs programs.
